File: twist.mma

Groove: Twistend

Notes: Take me back to the 60s! This is a classic twist rythm made famous by Chubby Checker with "The Twist".

Author: Bob van der Poel

Description: A short and sweet 2 bar ending.

SeqSize: 2 Time (beats per bar): 4
